title: Train derails in Rambukkana
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); A train had derailed between Rambukkana and Kadigamuwa on Monday (16) morning, bringing the operations along the Up-Country Railway Line to a complete standstill.
Deputy General Manager of Sri Lanka Railways Gamini Seneviratne told News 1st that a Kandy to Colombo train had thus derailed.
